description:
Analyze your performance with power-based training. The Powrlink power meter is built into the Speedplay Zero pedal platform to deliver power and cadence metrics to ANT+ or Bluetooth devices in real time. An internal gyroscope removes cadence variations to ensure precise power readings to 1% accuracy. Plus the rechargable battery lasts 75 hours and recharges with a simple cable.

  • Compatible with Wahoo Ecosystem for connected training
  • Pedal sensor has +/-1% accuracy
  • Total power is estimated by doubling left side power
  • Internal gyroscope tracks your cadence
  • Compatible with ELEMNT GPS computers, KICKR smart trainers, and iOS, Android, PC and GPS devices with Bluetooth or ANT+ connectivity
  • Connects up to 3 Bluetooth devices and unlimited ANT+ devices at the same time
  • LED indicators on spindle display power, connection and low battery charge
  • IPX7 waterproofness offers serious weather protection
  • Compatible with oval chain rings
  • 3-axis customization: 6mm left/right, 13mm fore/aft, 0-15º float
  • Triple sealed cartridge and needle bearings
  • Lightweight composite body with durable stainless steel spindle
  • Integrated rechargeable lithium battery provides 75 hours of use
  • Regular firmware updates wirelessly via Wahoo Fitness App
  • In the box: Left Powrlink Zero pedal, right standard pedal, Standard Tension cleats, 55mm Q-factor washers, cleat spacers, screws, charging cable and documentation
name: Wahoo Fitness Speedplay Powrlink Zero Left Power Meter
